name: Flax (Prototype)
description:
This is a small game I created originally using Blitz3D and later ported to Unity3D. It's sort of complete and doesn't really work in multiple resolutions that well (recommend 800x600 or 1024x768 windowed) but I figured I would make it available anyways.

You can play against the computer or with two people on one keyboard. The goal is to win 5 rounds by using the power-ups that appear at random. When a power-up appears, hit it with the ball to get it. To use it, press the key that appears under the power-up to queue activation next time the ball hit your paddle. Each player can only have three power-up's at a time.

Player One Controls
  • Move Paddle Up: W
  • Move Paddle Down: S
  • Activate PowerUp One: 1
  • Activate PowerUp Two: 2
  • Activate PowerUp Three: 3
Player Two Controls
  • Move Paddle Up: Up Arrow
  • Move Paddle Down: Down Arrow
  • Activate PowerUp One: 7
  • Activate PowerUp Two: 8
  • Activate PowerUp Three: 9
